DataSource DataSource Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

Represents a datasource definition in Azure Search, which can be used to configure an indexer.

AzureBlobStorage(String, String, String, String, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy, String) AzureBlobStorage(String, String, String, String, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy, String)

Edit

Creates a new DataSource to connect to an Azure Blob container.

public static DataSource AzureBlobStorage(string name, string storageConnectionString, string containerName, string pathPrefix = null, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy deletionDetectionPolicy = null, string description = null)Public Shared Function AzureBlobStorage(name As String, storageConnectionString As String, containerName As String, pathPrefix As String = Nothing, deletionDetectionPolicy As DataDeletionDetectionPolicy = Nothing, description As String = Nothing) As DataSource
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the datasource.

storageConnectionString
String String

The connection string for the Azure Storage account. It must follow this format: "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=[your storage account];AccountKey=[your account key];" Note that HTTPS is required.

containerName
String String

The name of the container from which to read blobs.

pathPrefix
String String

Optional. If specified, the datasource will include only blobs with names starting with this prefix. This is useful when blobs are organized into "virtual folders", for example.

deletionDetectionPolicy
DataDeletionDetectionPolicy DataDeletionDetectionPolicy

Optional. The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

description
String String

Optional. Description of the datasource.

Returns
DataSource DataSource

A new DataSource instance.

Edit

Creates a new DataSource to connect to an Azure SQL database with change detection and deletion detection enabled.

public static DataSource AzureSql(string name, string sqlConnectionString, string tableOrViewName, HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy changeDetectionPolicy, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy deletionDetectionPolicy, string description = null)Public Shared Function AzureSql(name As String, sqlConnectionString As String, tableOrViewName As String, changeDetectionPolicy As HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy, deletionDetectionPolicy As DataDeletionDetectionPolicy, description As String = Nothing) As DataSource
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the datasource.

sqlConnectionString
String String

The connection string for the Azure SQL database.

tableOrViewName
String String

The name of the table or view from which to read rows.

changeDetectionPolicy
HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy

The change detection policy for the datasource. Note that only high watermark change detection is allowed for Azure SQL when deletion detection is enabled.

deletionDetectionPolicy
DataDeletionDetectionPolicy DataDeletionDetectionPolicy

The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

description
String String

Optional. Description of the datasource.

Returns
DataSource DataSource

A new DataSource instance.

Parameters
name
String String

The name of the datasource.

storageConnectionString
String String

The connection string for the Azure Storage account. It must follow this format: "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=[your storage account];AccountKey=[your account key];" Note that HTTPS is required.

tableName
String String

The name of the table from which to read rows.

query
String String

Optional. A query that is applied to the table when reading rows.

deletionDetectionPolicy
DataDeletionDetectionPolicy DataDeletionDetectionPolicy

Optional. The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

description
String String

Optional. Description of the datasource.

Returns
DataSource DataSource

A new DataSource instance.

DocumentDb(String, String, String, String, Boolean, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy, String) DocumentDb(String, String, String, String, Boolean, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy, String)

Edit

Creates a new DataSource to connect to a DocumentDb database.

public static DataSource DocumentDb(string name, string documentDbConnectionString, string collectionName, string query = null, bool useChangeDetection = true, DataDeletionDetectionPolicy deletionDetectionPolicy = null, string description = null)Public Shared Function DocumentDb(name As String, documentDbConnectionString As String, collectionName As String, query As String = Nothing, useChangeDetection As Boolean = True, deletionDetectionPolicy As DataDeletionDetectionPolicy = Nothing, description As String = Nothing) As DataSource
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the datasource.

documentDbConnectionString
String String

The connection string for the DocumentDb database. It must follow this format: "AccountName|AccountEndpoint=[your account name or endpoint];AccountKey=[your account key];Database=[your database name]"

collectionName
String String

The name of the collection from which to read documents.

query
String String

Optional. A query that is applied to the collection when reading documents.

useChangeDetection
Boolean Boolean

Optional. Indicates whether to use change detection when indexing. Default is true.

deletionDetectionPolicy
DataDeletionDetectionPolicy DataDeletionDetectionPolicy

Optional. The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

description
String String

Optional. Description of the datasource.

Returns
DataSource DataSource

A new DataSource instance.
